ygData.subject: Re: Archery--Skill Cap???
ygData.msgSnippet: I m not sure about what the cap is, I do know that skills are capped at different levels for each class.  I think, for example, that sneak is capped around
ygData.messageBody:
I'm not sure about what the cap is, I do know that skills are capped at
different levels for each class. I think, for example, that sneak is
capped around 75-80 on rangers. It could be that the eq designers
decided that paladins should not be all that good at archery. I guess
they figured that even though we should get archery we should not be very
good at it?


On Wed, 23 Jun 1999, Brown, Lee X wrote:

> From: "Brown, Lee X" <Lee.X.Brown@...>
>
> I seem to hit this cap at level 19, and it still wont increase at level
> 20..... maybe archary is bugged on us paladins.... time to ask a GM i
> think...
>
>
> Regards
> Cubious
> Paladin of the 20th Circle
>

Aeldric, squire in the Hall of Truth (Erollisi Marr)
Jellarinn, a woodsman (Fennin Ro)
Therisian wanderer and apprentice enchanter (Fennin Ro)
